Message 3691 of 4024
Do you have 15mins today 9:45-10am? I want to address your email on Adrian so there is no misunderstanding.
If not I can send other times later this evening or tomorrow. . . .
Sent:08/13/2024 at 09:27 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 08/13/2024 at 09:28 AM)
Subject:15 mins
Message 3692 of 4024
Thanks for the offer.
I would love to hear your pov but I am hesitant. I have done all I can to give you time and space, but you refuse to even make the smallest gesture
towards peace.
And I’m not sure I can stand more hostility. When you want to start engaging in a peaceful and constructive way for the kids and us, please let me
know. I’m all ears.
Sent:08/13/2024 at 01:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/13/2024 at 03:09 PM)
Subject:Re: 15 mins
Message 3693 of 4024
I’ll step back.
Less than 3 weeks ago you sent an email asking if I was coordinating child abduction.
